Reviews.Title: Best decoy/dummy camera
Reviews.Author: AMZN_FanBoi
Reviews.Content: This is the best decoy camera that I have seen and personally deployed.I have purchased two other dummy cameras for my strategic needs (see my other reviews) and neither of those can compare to the quality and build of the QSM30D.Q-see is a legitimate manufacturer of video security systems and this is packaged very well and built with quality components.Very important note (feature):- the LED is activated only at night- this saves battery (which is included)- this adds to the realismMake sure to consider this dome decoy where applicable. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: John J. Bejshak
Reviews.Content: Let's start with most dummy cams look fake.. now with that said and after looking at 59 pages for of security equipment on Amazon this Q-SEE dome cam is worth the money. This dome cam has a built in LED infer red sensor allowing the red light to only come on when you get to close to the camera; A blinking red light dose not exist on any real security cameras.You could also buy a real security camera and not connecting it - Q-SEE also makes real security cameras so this helps make it more real and from past experience they work as a good deterrent.I added an inexpensive screw on antenna making look more real and placement is also important. Most all dome security cameras have a plastic base, any real bullet type security camera is metal avoid plastic. In buying a plastic dome security camera other then Q-SEE leave the battery's out. The bad guys knows that a security camera with a blinking red light are fake.Best is to buy a motion sensor there "GREAT" they work allowing you to know someone is on your property, in your garage. Here on Amazon look for the Dakota at $14.99 looks like something out of the 1950's but works like a charm. [OR] LS-818-6B Wired Wall/Ceiling Mount Passive Infrared Motion Detector Alarm for Corridor,Entrance ways or where ever you need it: $6.98 cheap plastic but it gets the job done save your money.

Reviews.Title: Realistic decoy camera
Reviews.Author: K. Lund
Reviews.Content: This is a very realistic decoy camera, especially with the flashing red light at night. I bet evildoers would think twice after they saw this on your ceiling!

Reviews.Title: Good Product with a Few Cautions
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: I bought several of these Q-See Decoy Cameras and like them okay. Q-See makes an impressive array of real security cameras, so the decoy fits nicely into their product line, making it seem more realistic.  Batteries and mounting hardware are helpfully supplied with each unit.So what are the cautions?  They are:(1)  It appears the flashing LED mechanism has been simplified to be on all the time. Each of the units I received has a space marked for a flasher on-off switch, but there is none.(2)  A mounting template is thoughtfully included, but in the instance of my units it seems to be for an earlier model because it is quite wrong. I followed it carefully and the lens ended up pointing at an off angle. That's when I realized the holes on the template are in the wrong place. So I ended up having to patch the extra holes in my porch ceiling and start all over again. The template has to be modified to work correctly.  Please note this applies to the template that came with my units--for all I know, others could be correct.(3)  On the outside (!) of the units is a label with model number, etc., and the words "DECOY CAMERA." Clearly this label should have been placed on the top, out of sight. It comes off with isopropyl alcohol.(4)  Don't expect long battery life.  Three fresh AA alkalines last three to four weeks.  I'm going to try lithium batteries, but of course they're not cheap.  It is due to the cost of batteries that I'm giving this product four stars instead of five.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like the real thing. Very well made, I'm impressed. I wired it in permanently instead of powering by batteries so never have to worry about batteries going flat when I'm away.Update after 1 year (19 Dec 2013) This camera is still working perfectly with no signs of deterioration. Installed on the back of my yacht and no sign of salt water damage, or UV damage either. Here in the Caribbean with the harsh sunlight and reflection off the water that is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Best Dummy/Decoy Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Book Reader "Book Reader"
Reviews.Content: Q-See is a legitimate security company, so it's no wonder their dummy/decoy camera is the best!  Let me start by saying that the camera "ball" is about the size of a "Magic 8 Ball"  The camera comes with 3 AA batteries and mounting hardware and a booklet of instructions.What's great about this particular camera is that once you turn it on, it's only going to flash the "red light" when it's dark outside, saving you all sorts of AA battery costs.  The booklet says the batteries should last 2-3 months.  You don't even need to have a red light flashing, because it would tend to make the camera look like a fake in my opinion.I've chosen to mount this by the door of my camping travel trailer.  It sits flush against the side of the trailer and if it scares someone off who's intending to break into the trailer, that's fine!  Eventually I plan on getting a legitimate wireless camera and monitor, but until then - this will work.Amazon also sells a twin-pak of these and now I'm sorry I only bought the single unit! Q-See QSM30D2PK Dome Decoy Cameras 2 Pack

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: mr.chinatown
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to install.  Drill 2 holes, insert batteries and this will fool any and everyone!  I purchased a few of these to place around the house to deter all thieves!

Reviews.Title: Still working after one year
Reviews.Author: AL pat
Reviews.Content: I have two of these. This is the only one I could find that would flash only at night saving the battery. I haven't had to replace them yet. The best way to mount them I found was to use outdoor Velcro mount them high. Also be aware that this company also makes functional cameras leaving even more doubt as to being watched.

Reviews.Title: Worked for our shop
Reviews.Content: I wanted to wait until we were not using these to review them, for obvious reasons.  These are VERY realistic and effective decoy cameras.  We were having a problem at a shop (no longer there) with things coming up missing.  Occurrences of missing items went almost to zero with a pair of these decoys in place.  NOTE: Even though the decoys are not real, we made sure to post to the public that they were being watched (which is something I think you are supposed to tell customers but I am not sure).

Reviews.Title: Looks Great
Reviews.Author: Edward J Goodwin
Reviews.Content: Look like the real deal. They are very easy to install. I went to the Q-See site and they had window stickers. Bought enough to cover all the doors and windows close to the doors to insure they are seen.

Reviews.Title: decoy camera
Reviews.Author: Ponybuilder
Reviews.Content: Looks real. It really does. The name that's written on it looks cheesy but I heard they are a real camera company. Good product for the money. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: popchop
Reviews.Content: It was everything I expected and more. From comments, it does what it is supposed to do and adds a little more security to our home.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Robert Jones
Reviews.Content: Dome camera looks real however it could do without the cheesy looking logo on the outside of it.  Can't turn it away from line of sight due to the placement of the interior fake camera.

Reviews.Title: Fools a thief
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Camera was easily mounted on the upper eave of my oversize garage on my property. Used the blinking red light feature on a dusk sensor. Walked around from several angles looking at it and it looks pretty convincing to me. Its not too obvious, but not hidden either. Bought a yard sign too. If this decoy system fails, I'd be pretty surprised. Hopefully the batteries don't need constant changing.If I was a thief, I'd probably move on to the next garage after seeing this.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: bruno
Reviews.Content: very nice ...looks like a actual camera for this price ....like the blinking light and easy to install ..cant beat the price

Reviews.Title: good camer
Reviews.Author: Steven Carter "Steven B. Carter"
Reviews.Content: looks real outside your front door. I had to use the OUTDOOR FAKE / DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light (Silver) from (UniquCamera)  for the back door though. Both were good dummy cam's that have worked so far. I still am saving up for a real CCTV system but this has definately done the job.

Reviews.Title: Just a little too cheaply made for me
Reviews.Author: Steve B.
Reviews.Content: Be sure you notice that these are for indoor use only!  The directions say to use enclosed template for screw hole locations, but there's no template provided so you need to make your own, which is no big deal.  There's no on/off switch.  Just didn't like these.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: RICH MEYERS
Reviews.Content: Batteries wear out within 1 week.  This unit needs to be updated so batteries will last longer than that.  Junk!

Reviews.Title: Not as reviews say. It faked me out!
Reviews.Author: John Whitford
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and they mentioned LED off at night and IR motion activated. This camera does not have that. The light is either always on or always off selected by the switch on back. I am not sure this camera will fool anyone except buyers.

Reviews.Title: Q-See
Reviews.Author: Artie
Reviews.Content: The camera decoy looks realistic and I love the way it is designed.  The light that is suppose to turn on when it senses motion did not work from the beginning.  I won't bother returning it since it will be a waste of my time. I have bought so many items in Amazon and this is the first one that failed me.  Oh well, there is always a first time.

Reviews.Title: It does its job
Reviews.Author: GPinNC
Reviews.Content: What can I say.....this unit looks real, was easy to attach under the eave above my front door, and has been blinking away for almost 6 months now.  It gives me a little piece of mind....I don't see how a would-be burglar could approach my door without seeing that red light blink at night.

Reviews.Title: junk-don't bother
Reviews.Author: Patrick G. Kelley
Reviews.Content: Did not work right out of the box...not worth my time to return it-don't bother buying this as it is pure garbage

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: gopack2012
Reviews.Content: great camera, looks very realistic and the flashing red light is great.would be wise to replace batteries before installing - will die quickly otherwiseoverall great! I looked at a ton of cameras online and this one was the best I could find for the money

Reviews.Title: Convincing, at night.
Reviews.Author: ube's icecream shop
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a great product. The night sensor to activate the red led works fine. The body is cheap looking, so to make it look more realistic - I removed the logo and painted the body. Looks more convincing now, and people are now aware that they could be being watched when entering.

ProductInfo.Features:
Realistic Light Effect of Infrared LEDs (Battery Required)
3-Axis Bracket for Flexible Installation
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSM30D Dome Decoy Camera
